entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
